title: X vs Farcaster: The Resilience of Decentralization
description:
X, a central figure in social media for years, operates on a centralized network. This means that all of its operations. From data storage to content delivery, are managed through a unified system. Centralization streamlines management and content delivery but creates a single failure point. In this article, you’ll discover more about the difference between […]

The post X vs Farcaster: The Resilience of Decentralization appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.
